main.subtitle: At the height of modern luxury
main.description:
Soar above the city at Discovery Primea Makati, a 68-storey luxury hotel in Metro Manila’s iconic Central Business District. A member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts LVX Collection, the brand new property is part of a distinctive portfolio of worldly and illustrious hotels offering highly personalized service. Discerning travelers on a quick sojourn or an extended stay will delight in state-of-the-art amenities such as High Speed Internet Access, a Nespresso machine, Internet Protocol Television, and PressReader.

 

The 141-room deluxe hotel is home to the swanky Gilarmi Lounge and the acclaimed Restaurant Tapenade, an all-day Mediterranean restaurant with a bespoke Tapenade Salad Room. The hotel features a 20-meter heated infinity pool, the Terazi Spa, unique for its authentic Turkish bath, and the state-of-the-art 37 Degrees Gym with TechnoGym facilities.

main.subtitle: Where business meets leisure
main.description: Experience comfort at Discovery Suites where the convenience of a serviced residence is balanced with the perks of modern hotel living. Our well-appointed One Bedroom Suites have living and dining areas and a fully-furnished kitchen, ideal for extended stays. Discovery Suites is a proud member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts Connect Collection, featuring smart and welcoming hotels located in interesting neighborhoods, ideal for work and play. The 220-key property offers High Speed Internet Access for unlimited devices and PressReader, which gives guests digital access to newspapers and magazines worldwide. More than staying connected, the hotel offers an indoor pool and a well-equipped gym with a jacuzzi and sauna. Dining options include 24-hour room service, its flagship steak restaurant 22 Prime and Restaurant 5 for Pan-Asian cuisine.

main.subtitle: Award-winning, iconic, unforgettable
main.description: Experience the finest in island hospitality in the multi-awarded Discovery Shores Boracay, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts’ vibrant Lifestyle Collection. Located in the world-famous White Beach, the resort offers plush privacy while still being in the pulsating center of the island. More than the white, velveteen sand that Boracay is famous for, beach lovers will find pleasure in the ultimate pampering and genuine service of the resort’s highly-driven team. The 87-room luxury resort is consistently listed in Travel + Leisure’s World’s Best Hotels. It features the highly-acclaimed Terra Wellness Spa and Miele Guide-listed restaurants Sands and Indigo, as well as a swimming pool, a kiddie lounge, a recreation room, a gym, and spaces for meetings and events, while the vast beachfront serves as a perfect backdrop for destination weddings and celebrations.

main.subtitle: A colorful island all to your own
main.description:
Enjoy front row seats to the Philippines’ final frontier. Nestled in the untouched Dimakya Island, Club Paradise in Coron is your pristine playground in paradise with its abundance of flora and fauna, and its proximity to world-class reef and wreck dive sites. Dotted along the protected UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, its unrivalled marine life includes the gentle dugong and friendly sea turtles, making it a favorite escapade among families, friends and divers.

The 19-hectare exclusive island resort features 55 rooms and cottages with scenic views of nature, as well as the Glow Spa, Firefish Restaurant, and three bars. The radiant beauty of the island makes it a choice location for intimate destination weddings. Exciting day trip options include the Coron Island Tour, Calauit Safari, Bottom Fishing and Island Hopping.

main.subtitle: Discovery Hospitality's New Millennial Brand
main.description: Kip&Kin is not your typical hotel or hostel – nor do we try to be. At Kip&Kin, we want you to fit right in; to feel at home; to belong – no fronts, no fuss, no pretense. Kip&Kin is an experience of dynamic connections, changing and adapting to whatever you need us to be: a relaxed getaway or fun adventure, a ’workation’ or a work detox, ‘me time’ or a social mixer, a family outing or barkada trip. But most importantly, Kip&Kin doesn’t want life to get in the way of your travel desires. So we craft experiences with youthful finesse – enhancing the spirit of exploration with the style and substance that you deserve. Kickin’ soon. El Nido. San Vicente. Siargao.

main.subtitle: Discovery Samal
main.description: Offering the most magnificent views of the Davao Gulf and the best front row seats to nature’s spectacles, Discovery Samal is 30 minutes away from the Francisco Bangoy International Airport, Davao City. This grand haven is brilliantly designed by Architect Ed Ledesma of ELL, and embellished by interior designer Manny Samson of Emesaé Design Corp., bringing the sprawling enclave of carefully curated meeting, dining, relaxation, and entertainment options in the country’s premiere Resort City. Discovery Samal is set to open in 202
